comments: Participation in Carleton OCS Language & Culture in Russia program
prerequisites: Prerequisite: For students who have just recently begun their study of the Russian language, having completed or tested beyond elementary Russian 102.
subject: RUSS
summary: This course will focus on continued study of the fundamentals of Russian grammar, vocabulary expansion, and activation. This course is conducted by members of Moscow State University Philological Faculty and supervised by the program director.
title: Moscow Program: Beginning Grammar
